snippet.title: Game & Watch - Mario's Bombs Away (c)1983 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This the Game & Watch Mario's Bombs Away handheld game, a Nintendo product released in 1983.  There is an older video of this on the channel, but it lacked the case artwork.

This one sees Mario take to the jungle, which he must carefully navigate while carrying a bomb.  It is in many ways similar to Turtle Bridge, where you must also deliver a package from one side to the other with the person at the other side not always being ready to take it.  This is one of the high end Panorama units, so is presented in full colour and is definitely one of the best looking Game & Watch units as a result.

Recent work on Game & Watch emulation has come from Algestam, with earlier work being done by Sean Riddle and hap.  DarthMarino provided the artwork for more recently emulated units, while hydef was generally responsible for the artwork on ones emulated before 2020, links to the artwork are below

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
